title: Absolute Christmas Collection (Top 100)
description:
Absolute Christmas Collection


This truly is an absolute selection of Xmas songs, containing the classics (Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin, Ella Fitzgerald), Scores and soundtrack listings of the best Xmas movies ever, and modern and contemporary Xmas hits.

Selected and sorted out from various "top 100 Xmas lists" and over 800 songs i have in my hard drive.

This is the collection you want to have.

All songs properly tagged, all encoded in Mp3 format.



      ---------------------------------------------------------------------
